SEARCH
Package game.grounds.spawners

Class Spawners

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.grounds.spawners.Spawners
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, CanSpawn
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bush, EmptyHut, Graveyard
public abstract class Spawners extends Ground implements CanSpawn
The Spawners abstract class represents a type of terrain that can spawn actors. It provides functionality for spawning actors at specific locations and managing spawn chances. Classes that extend this abstract class can implement their own spawn mechanics. The Spawners class extends the Ground class and implements the CanSpawn interface. It maintains a list of potential spawn locations and uses randomization to determine if actors should spawn.

    • spawnMechanic

      public void spawnMechanic(Location location)
      Implements the spawn mechanic for this terrain. It iterates through exit locations and checks if a monster can spawn at each location. If conditions are met and the random chance allows it, a monster is spawned. The spawnLocation list is cleared to reset possible spawn locations.
      Specified by:
      spawnMechanic in interface CanSpawn
      Parameters:
      location - The location where the spawn mechanic is applied.
